NewsDetail.Name: A BYU-Idaho Christmas with Brian Stokes Mitchell
NewsDetail.Title: A BYU-Idaho Christmas with Brian Stokes Mitchell
NewsDetail.Abstract: Brian Stokes Mitchell performs for BYU-Idaho. Tickets go on sale October 3 through the BYU-Idaho ticket office.
NewsDetail.Author: missing value
NewsDetail.BodyCopy:
A BYU-Idaho Christmas

with Brian Stokes Mitchell

Saturday, December 3, 7:30 P.M.

BYU-Idaho Center

 

 

Broadway star Brian Stokes Mitchell will be the featured musical guest artist at the University's first Christmas program in the new 15,000-seat BYU-Idaho Center.  The singer-actor will join BYU-Idaho choirs and orchestra, and other students from the College of Performing and Visual Arts.  A powerful baritone, Mitchell has been one of the central leading men of the Broadway theater since the early 1990's.  He won a Tony Award for "Best Actor in a Musical" in 2000 for his performances in Kiss Me, Kate.  His Broadway career also includes performances in Man of La Mancha (Tony nomination and Helen Hayes Award), Ragtime (Tony nomination), and August Wilson's King Hedley II (Tony nomination). Mitchell was featured in the 2008 Christmas program and this year's Pioneer Commemoration Concert by the Mormon Tabernacle Choir.

 

 

 

RATING: CHRISTMAS MUSIC

Tickets go on sale October 3. Cost is $12 for general public, $6 for BYU-Idaho students.  No children under 6.  Preshow dinner is $15. Event Dress.  Click here to order tickets.

Brian Stokes Mitchell's official Website: www.brianstokes.com

Brian Stokes Mitchell performing with Mormon Tabernacle Choir:
